article_title: Alexander Hamilton warned us about the likes of McConnell
article_text:
McConnell a leading example of how bad Senate has become, voting for more than 50 percent of filibusters

Increasingly, filibuster has been used to increase inequality

Poll shows McConnell the most unpopular political figure in the country

article_metadata.description: In a recent Gallup poll 84 percent of Americans regard Congress unfavorably, and one wonders if the rest misunderstood the question. The great majority despises Congress’ dysfunction and partisanship.
article_metadata.title: Alexander Hamilton warned us about the likes of McConnell | Lexington Herald-Leader
